name: Train of Afterlife
storyline: You are riding on a train without a name, memory, or your own body. Along with you are five other passengers who will share their thoughts and various tales of their past life before reaching their destination. One of them is clearly different from the rest, as he or she is closely tied to your past - a past that will greatly change your destination. As you embark on the final stage of your life, what will you discover? What is waiting for you at the end of your journey?
